00029 class Object: public Function {
00030     public:
00032         typedef std::vector<unsigned> uintvec1D;
00034         typedef std::vector<uintvec1D> uintvec2D;
00035 
00036         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00037         virtual ~Object () { }
00038         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00039                              double, double, double,
00040                              double, double, double);
00041 
00042         virtual void Transform (const VecMath::Rotation<4> &R,
00043                                 const VecMath::Vector<4> &T);
00044         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00045         virtual void Draw (void);
00046         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double, double, double) {
00047             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00048             return tmp;
00049         }
00050 
00051         virtual unsigned getTsteps() const { return NumVertices; }
00052         virtual unsigned getUsteps() const { return 1; }
00053         virtual unsigned getVsteps() const { return 1; }
00054 
00055         virtual double getTmin() const { return -1; }
00056         virtual double getTmax() const { return 1; }
00057         virtual double getUmin() const { return -1; }
00058         virtual double getUmax() const { return 1; }
00059         virtual double getVmin() const { return -1; }
00060         virtual double getVmax() const { return 1; }
00061 
00062         virtual unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 0; }
00063 
00064     protected:
00065         virtual void Initialize();
00067         unsigned NumVertices;
00069         unsigned NumSurfaces;
00070 
00071         vec4vec1D X;        
00072         vec4vec1D Xtrans;   
00073         vec3vec1D Xscr;     
00074 
00076         uintvec2D Surface;
00077 
00082         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) {
00083             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00084             return tmp;
00085         }
00086 };

00093 class Hypercube: public Object {
00094 public:
00095     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00096         a = 1;
00097         declareParameter("Size", 1.0);
00098         Initialize();
00099     }
00100     Hypercube (double _a,
00101                const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00102     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00103 
00104     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00105 #       if 1
00106             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00107                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00108                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size") a = double(*i->second);
00109             }
00110 #       else
00111             setParameter(parms, this->a, "Size");
00112 #       endif
00113     }
00114 
00115     virtual std::string description () {
00116         std::ostringstream out;
00117         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00118         return out.str ();
00119     }
00120 protected:
00121     virtual void Initialize();
00122     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00123 
00124     double a;
00125     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00126 };

00173     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00174 #       if 1
00175             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00176                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00177                 if (i->second->getName() == "Level")
00178                     Level = unsigned(*i->second);
00179                 if (i->second->getName() == "Distance")
00180                     distance = unsigned(*i->second);
00181                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size")
00182                     rad = double(*i->second);
00183             }
00184 #       else
00185             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00186 #       endif
00187         }
00188

00191                          double, double, double,
00192                          double, double, double) {
00193         List.clear();
00194         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00195     }
00196 
00198     virtual std::string description () {
00199         std::ostringstream out;
00200         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00201         return out.str ();
00202     }
